text: 10 yrs ago I cowrote a paper on #supplychain design for critical needs products, inspired by issues with #H1N1 #vaccine production, which is presciently + eerily relevant to #COVID19 vaccines, noting #pandemics, plus outsourcing + demand uncertainty https://t.co/N8ZwiBfT8n #orms https://t.co/TcdyE64ZhH
